title: Windows 7: Local discovery over IPv6 unavailable

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
Local discovery over IPv6 is not working.  I have 3 different computers running either Windows 7 or 8.  It's the same for all three.  I wouldn't really care except I have separate instances running for different users on the same machine and it's my understanding that they can both work only if IPv6 local discovery is working.  In addition, UPnP is also not working.  The two may be related.  See my log output below.

